title: Vehicle Product
description: For vehicle product information such as category, number of doors, capacity, and ownership.

_id.title: Identifier
_id.description: A unique identifier for the record.

color.title: Color
color.description: Captures the color of the vehicle.

inventoryType.title: Inventory Type
inventoryType.description: Captures the inventory type of the vehicle.

luggageCapacity.title: Luggage Capacity
luggageCapacity.description: Number of pieces of luggage that fit in the vehicle.

make.title: Make
make.description: Captures the make of the vehicle.

mileage.title: Mileage
mileage.description: Captures the current mileage of a vehicle.

model.title: Model
model.description: Captures the model of the vehicle.

numberOfDoors.title: Number of Doors
numberOfDoors.description: How many operating doors the vehicle has.

options.title: Options
options.description: Captures an array of strings detailing vehicle options, such as heated seats, moonroof, navigation system, manual transmission, etc.

passengerCapacity.title: Passenger Capacity
passengerCapacity.description: Number of passengers that fit in the vehicle.

postalCode.title: Postal Code
postalCode.description: Captures the postal code where the vehicle resides.

starRating.title: Star Rating
starRating.description: Star rating associated with the vehicle.

style.title: Style
style.description: Captures the style of the vehicle, such as 2WD, 4WD, 2 Door Coupe, 4 Door Sedan, Convertible, etc.

trim.title: Trim
trim.description: Captures the trim level or series of the vehicle.

vehicleCategory.title: Vehicle Category
vehicleCategory.description: Vehicle category such as sedan, coupe, sports, station wagon, hatchback, convertible, etc.

vin.title: Vehicle Identification Number
vin.description: Captures the vehicle identification number (VIN) of the vehicle.

year.title: Year
year.description: Captures the model year of the vehicle.
